data.name: ReadCaseCaseRole
data.value: select T1.NUMB, T1.STATUS, T2.CSP_NUMBER, T2.TYPE, T2.CASE_ROLE_ID, T2.START_DATE, T2.END_DATE from CKT_CASE T1 join CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 on (T1.NUMB = T2.CAS_NUMBER) and (@cspNumber = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.END_DATE <= @endDate) order by T2.END_DATE desc, T1.NUMB

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, TYPE, ORGANIZATION_NAME from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb
